name: subscribo/exception
description: Package Exception contain shared functionality connected to exceptions and their handling

suggest.laravel/framework: This package have been developed to work with The Laravel Framework 5.0

suggest.illuminate/support: If ApiExceptionHandler Facade is being used. Suggested version ~5.0
suggest.illuminate/exception: If exception handler functionality is used. Suggested version ~5.0
suggest.illuminate/http: If exception handler functionality is used. Suggested version ~5.0
suggest.psr/log: If exception handler functionality is used.
suggest.subscribo/localization: If exception handler functionality (ApiExceptionHandler, ApiExceptionHandlerServiceProvider, ExceptionHandlerInterface) is being used
